website_summaries.verdict: Simple to set up and use, this affordable receiver offers very good audio for music and hands-free calling.
pros: Surprisingly full feature set for the money
Supplied with both solid plug and cable options

customer_reviews.title: Slim and sleek car Bluetooth receiver
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for past 5 days and I don't have any issues at all. I am so happy as my current car does not have the ability to play music. Now I can play music with the help of this Bluetooth receiver. On top of it, It is compact, good sound quality. quick and easy to pair.
customer_reviews.author: Vinod

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: My vehicles radio didn’t come with Bluetooth so I ordered this to plug into my audio button. I had already tried one that plugged into the charging port but people couldn’t hear me talk I believe because it was too far away. So this is up higher in my radio and I’m told that they can hear me perfect now. It was super easy to set up and used didn’t have to have daughter help I did it myself. I like that it shuts off automatically if I forget to turn it off myself.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected!! Sound quality = Great Mic quality = Good Pairing and range = Great Features = Good Now I have a wireless sound system for $15 which better than Airpods or IconX. With my favorite headphones, the sound is just great! I have some modification with clip and it stays well:)
customer_reviews.author: Eden N.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but some bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. But when it gets to ~ 5% it beeps every minute until it dies. even if you plug it in it will continue beeping even though it is charging. Also does not charge well in the car so when it gets unplugged to charge a phone. It will momentarily begin its low battery beeping.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Paige

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this so that we could do wireless play of music on a road trip. Worked phenomenally and allowed us to not have our phones on a super short cable with nowhere to put them.
customer_reviews.author: AJ258

customer_reviews.title: The metal piece of the bluetooth received that goes into ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal piece of the bluetooth received that goes into my aux port of my vehicle has broken off and the receiver is now not working. The metal piece is also stuck in my aux port and I am now forced to figure out a way to remove the metal piece that is lodged deep into the aux port.
customer_reviews.author: matt S

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Sometimes less.
customer_reviews.text: I have been unable to stream multiple device audio as described in the listing. I was very disappointed in the quality of the microphone. I don't know what I should have expected for such an inexpensive device. It sounds hallow, picks up way too much background noise and has no means to control these factors. It also has a lot of distortion and hum/buzz. I am impressed however with the incoming sound quality. They do function well for converting my Sony MDRv6 studio headphones to Bluetooth. They have good range and good audio signal. But as mentioned the mic is way too sensitive and metallic sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound AND Long Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I've several BT devices for different needs. Quality sound AND long battery life are not compatible...until I found ToaTronics BT Receiver. Great sounds and the longest battery life I've been able to find. The price is unbeatable too!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B._

customer_reviews.title: Impressive to the point of unreal.
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews, but was skeptical that the audio could be better via the TaoTronics Bluetooth Receiver. It is. Configuration: iPhone 8 -> TaoTronics Bluetooth Receiver (via Bluetooth) -> 3.5mm connector (male) to 3.5mm connector (male) to the car's AUX jack. PERFECT sound. If you're looking to use a wired headset with an iPhone 8 or newer, consider using the UGREEN Headphones Adapter for Apple (Amazon model number: 70507). Product feature request: Support wired headphones with a boom microphone for phone calls and voicemail... with the call quality of a UGREEN lightning to 3.5mm adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same as the others, no auto on.
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT automatically turn itself on with power. If you are looking at this model to replace your existing crummy one that annoyingly requires a long press EVERY TIME you get in your car, this is NOT the one. It's the same as the others, no autosync when you get in your car. Works great otherwise but some of us don't like that we have to long press and wait just because we popped into a convenience store or something for 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: W. BIGSBY

customer_reviews.title: Turn your favorite headphones wireless in an instant!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing works amazingly well as a receiver for headphones. I didn't even need to look at the instructions to have it working perfectly. The sound quality is superb and the delay is unnoticeable when watching videos on my phone. If you are looking to add an (almost) cable free functionality to your headphones, look no further! 100% recommend this product over real Bluetooth headphones. NOTE: The cable I am using does not come with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Lasted three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Battery is completely dead. Green "charging" LED illuminates when plugged into a standard USB wall wart, but does not charge at all. Unit does still work if plugged into a 'portable battery pack', wall wart, or other standard USB port, but will no longer work on its battery. Sound quality was good, to my poor ears, but it no longer functions the way I need it to. Was unable to locate a proper replacement battery on eBay / through a Google search, either (it's a .518Wh 3.7v 'pouch' cell with "ST 501624" written on it).
customer_reviews.author: michrech

customer_reviews.title: worked great with my samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: This device is great! Not only does it work with phones, but I was able to use it wirelessly with my samsung TV. I was able to get the TV sound to play through my PC speakers. I connected the bluetooth device directly to the input jack attached to my motherboard. I have a nice 2.1 speaker system with really good bass. The sound coming from my TV is now much better than the sound coming from the TV Speakers! Also, it seems that the battery lasts a really long time. I turned it on straight out the box without hooking it up to a charger. Its been 8 hours and the sound has been non stop!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: You’ll LOVE this little unit!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? This little baby is awesome. I have been blasting the tunes on the Jensen built-in stereo all day; and I mean BLASTING! The sound is really true, indiscernible from the cable I was previously using. It’s nice having a reduction in the number of cables I have to keep with me and this just does the job beautifully. Set up time was approximately 30 seconds; no drama at all. I spun up some ZZ Top on Apple Music and then the windows started to rattle. Would I recommend this adapter? Hell yes! Would I buy it again? In a heartbeat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great (for me)
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect, small bluetooth receiver. Setup was simple and connection is stable. I only wish that the audio jack and charging port were on the same side; the audio jack is on the long side and the charging port is on the short side. Pros: - Battery life: lasts at least 2 hours - Sound quality: I haven't noticed any degradation in sound quality (using mid-level consumer speakers) - Distance: At least 20 feet and through a wall - Size: Tiny (1"x2"x3/8") Cons: - None so far
customer_reviews.author: zed

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Really Good
customer_reviews.text: This receiver sounds remarkably good plugged into the auxiliary port of the stock sound system in my 2008 Ford Expedition using my LG V40. Full bass, midrange and treble with no background hiss. Much better than the FM bluetooth transmitters I've been using. I also like the fact that the battery level of this device is shown on my V40 when the bluetooth is paired. The only negative would be that the flashing pairing light is not easily visible in the daytime. Time to buy another for my 1993 F150 with an aftermarket Kenwood that lacks bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Logical Spock

customer_reviews.title: What a great little device
customer_reviews.text: Love this receiver. It’s small and was charged up right out of the box. I use it to bring new life to my NuTone system where the radio had stopped working. By adding an auxiliary jack, I am able to plug in this receiver and stream Pandora. My system has never sounded so good. And with a volume control on the TaoTronics was able to raise the volume on my NuTone to where it’s actually too loud all the way up (when the radio worked, I had to turn it all the way up just to be at an acceptable level).
customer_reviews.author: The Magician

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great! Not to connect bluetooth headphones to TV!
customer_reviews.text: Works. I bought it with the mistake of thinking it would allow me to connect bluetooth headphones to a tv. But, found out that won't work after receiving the product. I probably switched up this product with another product I was looking at for this purpose. Customer service is great. I gave them additional star because of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: I listen to music from my phone while I'm driving in my car. My car is an older model with only a headphone jack to link into the sound system. When I upgraded to an iPhone 8 I suddenly didn't have a headphone jack any more! Lightning to 3.5mm plug adapter didn't work very well. Then I found this device. Great price and it has worked reliably for several months now. Easily connects to my phone and no complicated buttons to figure out. A single charge lasts about a week. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Finally, A Product That Does as It Claims
customer_reviews.text: After being disappointed with Bluetooth headphones since they appeared on the market, I have finally found a product that lives up to its advertising. If there was an attached clip I would be even more pleased. Seriously, why isn’t there a collar clip? I would give 7 out of 5 stars for a clip. As it is, 6 out of 5 stars. Give this tiny product a try.
customer_reviews.author: Saraya

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼🦻🏽
customer_reviews.text: Am a truck driver and play a lot of music, Battery Life is good. It plays for hours. Great product love it
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect to earbuds
customer_reviews.text: They claim this will work with Bluetooth earbuds or headphones. I tried connecting this to my Bose earbuds and then my Sony headphones. I have no issues connecting the buds or headphones to my phone, laptop or iPad. But this receiver doesn't even try.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Very short range, good product if phone is nearby
customer_reviews.text: I use this alongside noise-cancelling earbuds that looks like those that are distributed by my workplace. Seeing as I can have my purse with me, the distance issue isn't that bad. But if you are looking for something where your phone can't be more than 5 feet away from you, steer away from this product. My purse can be on the other side of my body from the receiver and have spotty reception. Despite very short connection range, I am happy with this product. It is hidden inside my bra and the buttons don't accidentally deploy, though are easy to find if I need to pause my music to hear a coworker, change songs, or change volume.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Works great and sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Has a hissing sound but not terrible, especially for the price. This also made my door open/seat belt beep (warning beep that continually goes off when your door is open) in my car super loud when I turned up the volume, not sure what that was all about haha. Hooking it up was painless, it showed up in the Bluetooth menu right away. For the price it works well and feels like it’s built well. I would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with battey life
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. However my phone shows it still has 30% battery life (after only 3 or so uses about 7-10 minutes each) after about 30 seconds into listening to music it makes the noise signaling low battery a couple times and then shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: MaLLorY

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This tiny little bugger couldn't be any easier to use. The ONLY thing you need to remember is that it is battery powered so you have to turn it off when not in use. You can also just plug in the charger, but then you get the minor charging hum. Other than that you just plug it in and it works. The videos on the item listing are spot on when they show the ease of use. Great way to update an older car or home system. Nifty little gizmo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Makes annoying beeping sound
customer_reviews.text: Initially this worked pretty well but after about a week it started beeping while music was playing. It would beep every minute or so. I thought it needed to be charged so I charged it overnight. It kept beeping. At first I could unpair it and then repair and it would resolve the issue (which was kind of a hassle) but eventually that little trick stopped working also. Very disappointed. I’m back to using my aux cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but after a while.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in May and now it's more of a headache than it's worth. It worked fine for the first couple of months, but now it keeps dropping its connection with my phone and reconnecting constantly. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great for those of you who don't have a Bluetooth connection built into your vehicle and you want to choose what you listen to. You plug it into your aux port and then connect to the device via your phones Bluetooth. Had no problems connecting. Only complaint I have is that the person on the other end of the line always has a problem hearing me. They always tell me I sound far away and I have to yell a bit for them to hear me. It could be because of the location of my aux port too but this seems to be a common problem with these in my Ford escape.
customer_reviews.author: Laura VanDosen

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality great, product quality ok, CS great
customer_reviews.text: Great audio quality, convenient controls. Mine died after a month or so, but company will replaced it. My girlfriend had been using an older model for about 2 years, but it seems to be getting a little less reliable lately. I think quality is fair for the price, but there may be better options out there if you're willing to spend more. Their customer service is great though for a company that sells cheap electronics!
customer_reviews.author: R. Myers

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a more expensive product, that did not work. This gadget was advertised at around $10. I also watched a YouTube clip of this thing in action. I tried it. It works. Best $10 I've spent in a long time. My music sounds even crisper in my car for some reason when I use this Bluetooth device. Do not hesitate to get this device.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, but don't expect it to deliver pounding bass in large headphones
customer_reviews.text: I mounted it to an old ATH-M50 after de-soldering the original hardwired cable and installing a 3.5mm jack in its place. If you know anything about the ATH-M50 (38 ohm, 1600mW), you know they are a monster for bass. Expect to give that up if using this receiver on an M50/M50x. That's the only reason I reluctantly removed one star, but hey, it's the customer's job the make a manufacturer strive for better. I'd gladly accept shorter battery life to get higher peak voltages from this thing. How about a headphone edition meant for larger cans? Pretty please?
customer_reviews.author: duc916

customer_reviews.title: Solved my problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could play my newer iPod through my older Bose which doesn't have bluetooth or a way to dock a newer iPod. I plugged it into the auxiliary speaker connectors (not directly into the Bose itself) so that it would be right and left balanced and it works great. Because I don't need it to be portable, I also have plugged it into a full-time power supply so that I won't have to charge it. The receiver synced immediately with my iPod and the sound is great. But, mostly what I appreciate is that it was really simple and inexpensive solution to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that this product fell off of my Harley Davidson motorcycle while riding to Padre Island last weekend. So disappointed, as for the product itself it was amazing everyone was jealous and asked me where I got it before the mishap. I ordered another one because I seriously liked the product hopefully this one doesn't fall out as well or I will be disappointed. Had this not fell off would've given it 5 stars I give this 4.5 stars. Company reached out to me made things right, it was unexpectedly but appreciative at the same time. Thank you. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life and a great adapter for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that stands out is the ridiculous battery life. I've used it for maybe 4-6 hours nonstop before it got down to low battery. I've had other adapters that last half the time this one does. Music quality is pretty good. I haven't had any issues with it. Haven't had any issues with it disconnecting or anything yet. It's pretty great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: Does as prescribed
customer_reviews.text: Pros = great for cars without a current bluetooth function. Connects just fine and sounds great. I like that it operates on current bluetooth version as well. Works while charging. Cons = Have to turn it off (to preserve battery life) and on when starting the vehicle. Has automatic shutoff feature when nothing is connected over a period of time, so there is a bit of possible 'battery loss' during these times should you not like to turn it off when car is off. Still have to turn it on regardless, unless youve been away from it for just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: mikey

customer_reviews.title: Volume must be adjusted every time Bluetooth initiates connection to your device.
customer_reviews.text: Volume control has to be adjusted every time connection is initiated with the Bluetooth. It becomes annoying after a few times. Other than that the product has worked fine. Sound quality will depend on your equipment not on the adapter. I would not buy this again. I would choose an adapter in which I don’t have to adjust the volume on every connection.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Kow

customer_reviews.title: very good and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This small Bluetooth receiver is very very good. I have a big stereo in my home, but it can only be connected by 3.5mm audio port. My iPhone don’t have one and if you connect the iPhone with it, I cannot move my phone to anywhere else. It also have very convenient control button as shown in the video. The battery life can last for several days.
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK IN A CAR
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my car because my car is an older model that doesn’t have Bluetooth. Not even an hour after I plugged it in, the sound started cutting out. Every little bump in the road would knock it loose. I tried switching from the firm metal piece to the regular aux chord and taping it to the inside of my console (that’s where the aux plug in is) but it didn’t work. The sound quality is good when it’s not cutting out, but I shouldn’t have to try to fix it every two minutes while I’m driving. A waste of money considering now I have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Convert my sound system to blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: Use this to convert an older CD radio player in a boat to blue tooth so I can use my phone to access more music. Easy to use just plug in and press the button on then connevt your phone by blue tooth. Volume is somewhat limited compared to playing sounds without it but charges well and lasts a long time between charges.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Worked great the 1st day!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great the first day I had it. The next day it would not connect. I checked the unit and the green power light was on so I let it charge for several hours. As soon as I took the charging cable off the green light would turn off and it would not power on no matter how long I held that button. Plugged it back in and tried to power it on but still no response. Just the green light whenever I plugged it in. It does not hold a charge and apparently it will not power on even if it is getting power.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Weitzell

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: This turned my deck in my older truck Bluetooth capable, I love it!! Works excellent for music and calls, I’ve been told that I can be heard clearly when taking calls using this device. It maintains a stable connection and I have yet to have it disconnect while playing music. Would definitely recommend for anyone wanting Bluetooth in their ride but not ready to upgrade the system. This is honestly the next best thing. Included is 3m mounting tape to assist in setting up the device in a cool spot.
customer_reviews.author: jhawk415

customer_reviews.title: 5 star minus a design flaw in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if it would turn on when connected to power automatically. And disconnect of no connection for a certain period (like it does) but if your aux is in the glove box turning it on is kinda a hassle. Otherwise ZERO complaints. Lasts hours on battery life great quality (phone doesn't seem to want to auto connect but that might be my phone)
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great simple small device.
customer_reviews.text: Small device I use for both my car system and home stereo system. My phone does not have a audio output like most phones now. I am able to take phone into other rooms and have no problem with connect. Sound quality is great as good as plugging into my stereo with an adapter. Easy connect as well. Can charge while playing but if it gets under 10% it will beep while playing music somewhat annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands free is the way to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a power/audio cord splitter I had been using. Those devices, which allow the audio and power supply to enter an iPhone X through its single jack, inevitably start to have bad audio after 6 months. This obviates that problem and is working strong. Its nice on short rides to also not need to plug my phone in at all to get music.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for music with some static here and there, low phone calls sound quality, use their aux cable
customer_reviews.text: Pros- sound quality is great for music and phone calls! It doesn't have an echoe IF you use their aux cable connection... easy to use and install. Cons- the phone calls is on the low sound side where sometimes i would need to turn up the volume. I wish the Bluetooth would tell you the number that's calling you so you know who it is. So far so good only used it for 1 day review. **update** Nope I have static while playing music and I would have to unplug and plug it back in.
customer_reviews.author: lis

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get better than this
customer_reviews.text: If you’re worried about getting one of these things and it not working, look no further. This Bluetooth receiver works as expected. Just plug it in, hit the middle button and connect it through your phone. It’s not too hard. I always keep it plugged in so I’m not sure how long the batter lasts. Keep in mind that if you disconnect it from your phone when you exit the car, you will have to manually connect it again- a minor detail but it still takes away from the ease of use. Sound has been great- just as the car normally sounded with the radio if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, serves the purpose ( had a Sony speaker system that doesn’t have Bluetooth and I wanted to make it a Bluetooth system). Sound quality a bit less than I expected but for the price and for my purposes works well. No delay while watching a YouTube video so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Faz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Taotronics devices are among my favorite products. I own earbuds and other Bluetooth devices from them. I love the Bluetooth receiver/transmitter I got from them so I decided to get this for my girlfriend and it exactly what she needed. Its really simple all she uses it for is to pair her phone to her car, but it can do more then that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Angelo bini

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, for the price!!! Amazing actually!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you: this little thing is amazing. And very fast and responsible. Easy to set up once and you are good to go (meaning, connect to it each time). The battery of it it's also pretty good. Every since I bought it, I only charged it a few times and it's been days. The connection is perfectly table always. At first I keep disconnecting from it, and I didn't know why. Lol. Well, it's because it didn't come charged enough, so it kept dying on me. But after I charged it, it worked perfect. Just make sure you give it a good charge after you take it off the box! Duhh! Lol
customer_reviews.author: MrKyle

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product didn't last that long. It started making weird sounds after a month of use. Also, the battery lasts less than an hour now. However, the product was great for the first month. Another aspect I didn't like is the design. It's too minimalistic. There is only one button for turning it on/off and pair with new devices. The result is that this product is constantly pairing :D I don't recommend this product for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Campanoni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts several days in between charges. Sound quality is insanely good. I was prepared for mediocre sound quality due to how reasonably priced this little gadget is. I’m blown away. The sound is up there with regular Bluetooth systems that don’t need an attachment. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Celina Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, effective, good range!
customer_reviews.text: I personally have my aux plug in the center console so its a bit tucked away and was worried about the sound quality or connection issues as my phone is either in my pocket or on a wireless charger, but no such issues were present. The device needs a quick push to start and a short hold to turn off. It makes a static noise from the speakers if you leave it charging but that's just physics. Excellent product with no issues so far! Comes with a short aux male to aux male plug or a long (2ft I wanna say? Unsure.) and a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: BlackPonder

customer_reviews.title: The receiver is good, Taotronics service is great
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'm getting 15 hours of battery life out of this receiver, probably closer to 12. That's still pretty good, but I bought this specifically for the longer battery life. I don't know if it is just my unit or if they're all like that. I contacted Taotronics to see about exchanging it for a new one but they offered a partial refund instead. That seemed to be my only option so I took it. So in the end I'm satisfied with the receiver's performance based on what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Love ours
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time buying this. I really recommend it. People on Bluetooth say they can hear us just fine, and the battery really lasts forever. It's great for our older vehicles that we don't want to have to replace the whole radio in. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is slick for the price! My old ipod dock is back to life! Came with usb cable (no plug for the outlet), a metal audio jack (which seems solid, but scared me too much to use it for fear I would snap the bluetooth thing or the jack itself), and a short audio cable.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Have a vehicle without bluetooth audio? This will fix it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very satisfied with this receiver/car kit. He is using it in his truck that doesn't have bluetooth and now he can listen to songs on his phone through his truck. It works like it says it works and the quality is great! You can also use it to switch between two phones in cars with bluetooth without having to disconnect one and reconnect the other.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Richerson

customer_reviews.title: Cure for ios12 bluetooth problem
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Reasonably priced. Absolutely solved my problem with iOS 12 Bluetooth no longer working with my older Bluetooth devices. As long as your device has a 3.5 mm input Jack this will receive the Bluetooth and feed it directly into the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Dareya D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money best Bluetooth adapter
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth adapter I’ve used. I keep losing them at work though so I have to keep buying. I’m on my 3rd one. I would recommend this, easy to use, great sound, last hours. I drive work for so I listen to it for at least 4 hours and it last week a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is crazy on this . Took a 9 hour drive and it lasted 7 hours without being charged . Hold the power button for 3 whole seconds and it will turn off. The battery does quick if you don’t turn it off . Remember not to blame the product if you’re not using it proper 😂
customer_reviews.author: Not financially responsible

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works great Sometimes won’t charge when connected to devices? Will still play while plugged in. Keeps playing but get an audio warning that battery is dying . Kind of odd but disconnect and power off and charge and will charge just fine. So that big of an issues. Battery life started really good! Audio and mic both really good as well! Will buy same one once this dies! And at 15 yes it’s a disposable device the battery in it not expected to last over year or two.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth receiver and very practical
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is very easy to pair/connect my Bluetooth phone to so I can play music from my phone without having to use an auxiliary cord. This is very useful for when you have kids in the back cause you don’t need a long wire running across your car. Plays music with good sound quality and has long battery life which is perfect for the occasional road trips. The best part is you can’t beat the price for the functionality that it offers. I would highly recommend this great product.
customer_reviews.author: sujay shah

customer_reviews.title: Read before buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely unhappy with battery life. My old bluetooth use to keep charge for almost two weeks or little more. But this one I have to charge every 5th or 6th day. This will keep beeping while charging and while we are listening music and take longer to be charged on the other hand, my old bluetooth wasn't like that at all. Sound is okay but not like my old one. This one feels like sound is coming from far and we constantly increasing volume in our vehicle. Not very happy with the product and will not recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Muzaffar Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'm an audiophile, so I'm picky about my audio. Great range, great sound, and great battery life. Very compact and nicely designed. I actually have the running to an aux splitter, then running to two devices. Works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I'm mainly giving a 5 just because how good it looks. Its small and very tactical looking. Works greats, connects to BT fast and just looks very nice. Only issue but not really an issue would be if you actually use the buttons on it only because I'm use to clicking for volume but with this one if you click its to skip a song or play a previous one. To actually turn volume you need to hold it. No biggie tho cause I put max volume and use vehicle volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Gurrola01

customer_reviews.title: Way too quiet
customer_reviews.text: Audio is always super low. Way too quiet. I have to turn my car stereo up to dangerous levels, and if you disconnect and forget to turn it down you get radio in your ears at 90%. I'm a tech professional so I tried everything to get it louder. No go. Its too low.
customer_reviews.author: Tcabez

customer_reviews.title: Latest Bluetooth 5.0 standard. Stable and fast connection
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for a few days and I’m using it as a Bluetooth dongle for my wired Bose QC 20 noise cancelling headphones. I like that I don’t have to use the iPhone lighting adapter to connect my headphones. This is very convenient for me as I can just put the dongle in my pocket and carry my iPhone especially in the gym. Overall I am happy with the sound quality, battery life and strong, stable Bluetooth connection. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for detaching headphones from the source. Good sound quality, very lightweight, no pairing issues, easy and intuitive controls. Only two small criticisms: I wish there was keylock to prevent errant button presses or accidentally turning it on. And the blue light that flashes to show it's on is beneath the button you hold you turn it on. So if you're not listening on the headphones when turning it on, you have to try to clear the light with your finger to see when the blue begins to flash. These are minor points. Overall, I'm happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Imposter

customer_reviews.title: Works when it works, dies quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 4 days. It works great....when it works. 2 problems: won't stay charged and cuts off after about 10 minutes of use. Even though I charged it the day I got it. And keep it charged in my car as well. The other issue is that I have to reconnect it every time I get in my car and that is annoying and I have to remember to disconnect after I turn off my car or stays connected. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: eclass7

customer_reviews.title: Long aux cord
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I bought this is because I thought it had a very short ox cord so I wouldn't have all these cords all over my car unfortunately it does not come with a short aux cord. it came with a very long aux cord but overall there's nothing wrong with the product. the picture is a little misleading I should have looked at the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I finally can talk on the phone in my car without the person on the other end complaining they here static or an echo! I just plugged it into my auxiliary port in my car and it worked great! I even played music with no problem. I can only hope it lasts, I'm not sure yet but it seems to be working great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: Works well with one issue
customer_reviews.text: I would give the TaoTronics Bluetooth Receiver 5 stars, but there is one big issue. It will not automatically connect to my phone. I have to manually connect each time I get into my car. Support was unable to resolve the issue. Otherwise, sound quality is good and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent addition for me. I can plug it into anything with a aux port and bam, now it's Bluetooth. Works great. Sound is clear. Battery definitely lasts for 7 hours straight. I haven't pushed the 10 hour claim yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth battery hell
customer_reviews.text: Battery life stinks!!! And keeps cutting in and out, when it works it works nice , can’t say it’s me or not but I do know that it does not hold a charge long . That’s to bad because if it did I would give it a better rating over all
customer_reviews.author: veronica charnley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent....!
customer_reviews.text: Got this device for an old stereo which has very good speakers... Now I can play anything from my tablet into the old stereo. Amazing!!! Quality is very good. One note... Because it is an old stereo, I had to use a special cable to connect this device into the AUX port of my stereo. The product itself comes with two connectors which were not useful for me, but with the right cable, it does work and sound is PERFECT....! The gadget does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: M. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I hate messing with technology but this was simple. I turned it on, turned on blue tooth on my iPhone and clicked on this. Easy. I just leave it in my car and charge it occasionally with the plug in my car.
customer_reviews.author: SharonGill2357

customer_reviews.title: Better sound than Satellite Radio = I will cancel Satellite ...
customer_reviews.text: Better sound than Satellite Radio = I will cancel Satellite Radio. I don't know why I didn't buy this sooner to pair my phone to. Works flawlessly and it is small enough to just unplug and hide in glovebox. Awesome little gadget... and here I was going to install a new Bluetooth stereo. I am glad I didn't and I am glad I got this receiver. All because of the Power of Grayskull. I now have the pooooooooooweeeeeeeeeeeerrrrrr....
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Martinez-Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: The battery does not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not hold a charge. I followed the instructions, charging the device until the light turned off, indicating full charge. Once in my car, this worked about 8 minutes before shutting off completely. After that, I was able to get it to "work" by having it constantly plugged into an external phone charger while playing... not exactly convenient. It also tended to disconnect the bluetooth while in the middle of a song 30 minutes into a playlist, while i'm on the freeway and can't fiddle with it. Audio quality was fine when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Simple, reliable, useful, cheap
customer_reviews.text: One of the best $10ish I have spent. Makes my life more fun and less complicated. Turns any complicated car or home video / audio system into an easy-to-use Bluetooth speaker. My only complaint is that the battery dies after a week or two. But that is just me being hard to please. It really is great.
customer_reviews.author: William C Grisaitis

customer_reviews.title: Cut the wires (update after using few months)
customer_reviews.text: it works as it says. Prices should drop on these techs would be nice. Update: after using few months (3-4), that aux stainless steel pin shakes while driving (even on highways smooth roads) and it disconnects the audio signal. It's frustrating, when u have to fix that pin in middle of song, and then turn it back on. Dropping the rating from 4 to 2.
customer_reviews.author: sukhwinder singh

customer_reviews.title: Solid little receiver, bargain at this price.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought four inexpensive bluetooth adapters from various mfrs over the past couple years for my car and my kids'. Prices ranged from $15 to $30. Compared to the others this TaoTronics unit feels substantial and well-assembled. No complaints about sound quality - matches other sources (radio, Sirius) through the same stereo, plug fits solidly into the aux jack, no clicking or signal dropout, and doesn't generate that awful buzz if you're charging it while you're playing it. Overall it's probably the best of the four. Being the least expensive is icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: geack

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little receiver is AWSOME, I would give it 20 stars if I could, I’m not much of a reviewer but this item deserves my comments, sound quality is great, battery life super good and to my surprise it even has a microphone which made me super happy because is not only that I can listen to music in my 2008 Escape without wired connection but it turned it into a hands free voice call system, I upgraded my old hoopty LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Iskander Perez

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound , connects to multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bluetooth Receiver for my TV so I can connect it to other Sound system in the room . Sound is pretty clear and crisp . It's very small and compact and works for any device that's has Sound plug even my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Prue_love

customer_reviews.title: BEST AUX BLUETOOTH DEVICE!
customer_reviews.text: I used to just use an AUX cord to transmit my music from my phone and was wondering what was out there for an affordable Bluetooth device that I could plug in to transmit my music from my phone and boy oh boy! This baby works so amazingly! The sound is incredible with my factory speakers/subs and with no issues! And can turn up even louder than factory set volume thru device volume button (turning up the phone thru your phone)!
customer_reviews.author: H.J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best + Most afforable and Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of my time looking around Amazon for a Bluetooth adapter that I can use daily on my way to work. In the past, I have used many aux. cables but all were either to expensive or unreliable as many broke within a few weeks. I stumbled upon this product and was blown away by the charging time, how easy it was to use, as well as the affordable price. I have used it for weeks, not having to worry about charging it, or it breaking! Thank you! I urge you to buy it, as it was a life saver!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R.

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought this several years ago. My car only does bluetooth calls The audio was extra. I love it. The sound is so good. The controls work perfectly with Android and Amazon music
customer_reviews.author: consumer+

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than i thought, but still awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 12 bucks all in delivered(prime subscription tho), its definitely worth it. My truck is older and only has an aux jack. This is perfect for me, super easy way to add Bluetooth. I mounted it just below my radio with some double sided tape and seriously its awesome. Sound is great and it paired in seconds with my google pixle xl. Cant say anything on the battery life yet just bought it, but so far its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: PopDiddy

customer_reviews.title: Working well no issue with pairing
customer_reviews.text: Still experimenting with it, it can’t be charging when the car is running if you’re plugged into a USB device it will wine. I believe you can charge it though with a battery pack outside source other than the car
customer_reviews.author: @MustangMedic

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my older vehicle that cannot connect music via Bluetooth. Good quality sound and easy to operate. Battery life seems good and tells you on your phone what percent it is at. The only minor drawback, and maybe it's just me, is when I turn it on it doesn't automatically connect to my android (have not tried with my iPhone). Other than that, great little device. Would be good to use with an older amp that didn't have Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Greg E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and affordable
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I have two of them because I thought I lost one but found it. The only thing is that you have to be sure to plug the Aux cable all the way in or it won't work properly. Other than that - it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Le Lien

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! The sound is great and the battery lasts a long time - maybe 3-4 weeks for me, I only use it about 40 min a day. I didn't think the buttons would be a big deal but I love them! Volume up is easy to feel with a little bump on it and the skip buttons are great as well. Only small complaint would be I've accidentally double clicked the power off (the middle button) and it's called the last person I talked to. I've only done this twice in 2 months so not a big deal. Great sound, great controls, and long lasting battery for a fantastic price! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Will W

customer_reviews.title: It took two, but working well now
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received would not sync to my iPhone. After posting a review stating that the company contacted me and offered me an upgraded version and a refund. This new one works fine. Good customer service to follow up and make sure that I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Device works well and is easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: The 3.5mm audio adapter (see picture) was defective out of the box. There is no left channel when using this adapter. The audio cable works perfectly. I called Sunvalley Brands customer support phone number and they agreed to send a replacement. The young lady I spoke to (Vanessa) couldn't have been nicer; very good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my older car
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I use this to listen to my music in my car that does not have Bluetooth. It works well and is easy to control. Also easy to pair with your phone and the sound is as good as if your car came with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth receiver
customer_reviews.text: Using for portable amp. Works perfectly for my needs. Sound quality is good. Battery life averaging around 4 to 5 hours... good enough for basic jobs and outdoors by campfire. I'd buy again and recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DataDr

customer_reviews.title: No more cords!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I don't need to use a cord but I wish the male/male plug was shorter. It sticks out a bit far and therefore tends to get bumped rather easily. I wish the plug was shorter and kept the unit closer to the stereo face. Minor complaint and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth moon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! I was disappointed when my jeep didn't have blue tooth capabilities and then I used this adapter so I am able to stream my phone music through the car speakers! Works great! It's actually the second one I bought because I wanted it for my other car!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: This transmitter is very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple USB-C to aux converters and they have all failed on me at some point. This is why I decided to try this transmitter out. I like it very much and am able to charge my phone and listen to music at the same time on with my Galaxy Note 10+.
customer_reviews.author: CARTMAN26

customer_reviews.title: Great device but wish I had a better charge and bluetooth range
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product. I use it for my stereo at home. Instead of using an audio jack I decided to use this receiver in order to play music while outside. My issue with this product is that it seems to use more charge than it gains and many times the charging cable gets loose. I only use it while it is plugged in and it will use more power than it gains so I have to pause and turn off the device from time to time so that the low battery noise stops. The range on this device could be better but if you are using it in the car that shouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Sou d through the car speakers is great, but the microphone is awful. Tried in both cars (different model cars) and same result. I thought it might be due to location so I tried the extension aux input to raise it closer to the steering wheel and still horrible audio to the person being called.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

product_meta.title: TaoTronics Bluetooth Receiver/Car Kit, Portable Wireless Audio AUX Adapter 3.5mm Stereo Output (Bluetooth 5.0, A2DP, Built-in Microphone) for Home Audio Music Streaming Sound System
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe TaoTronics TT-BR05 Bluetooth 5. 0 Receiver with EDR + A2DP profiling offers a convenient and functional way to transform audio and hi-fi systems into wireless compatible ones. Pair two devices at once and listen to music or make phone calls with ease. The built-in microphone picks up your voice with clarity so you can chat without problems. With 10 hours of battery life, or 200 hours standby time, there is enough to last most car trips before you need to recharge. Ideal for car or home speakers, you can also enjoy high-fidelity stereo audio through headphones. Simply connect your ear buds once the car kit is synced to a device be blown away as they turn into hands-free Bluetooth headphones. What's included: Bluetooth 5. 0 Receiver (Model: TT-BR05)Micro USB Charging Cable3. 5mm Male to Male Audio Adapter3. 5mm Audio Cable; and User Manual.
feature_bullets: Wide compatibility: Bluetooth 5.0 Receiver compatible with most smartphones, ideal for home or vehicle audio systems. Please do not pair the gadget to bluetooth headphones or bluetooth speakers.
Double link: Connect two Bluetooth devices at once; freedom to enjoy music, GPS or answer phone calls.
Control it: Change the volume, play/pause music, or skip tracks with ease; Apple devices can even activate Siri with the click of a button.
Talk with clarity: Hands-free calling with the built-in microphone makes catching up with friends a breeze.
10 hours of talk and play time, or up to 200 hours on standby on background.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,285 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Bluetooth 5.0, Pair two device at once, Wireless, Car Stereo system, Hands-free Call
